author: Erin Durkin
title: Half of New Yorkers likely to get coronavirus, de Blasio says
description: That would add up to 4.2 million people contracting the virus.
content:
Bill de Blasio. | Getty Images
New Yorkers should expect that half the citys population will get coronavirus by the time the pandemic runs its course, Mayor Bill de Blasio said Wednesday.
